page.title: 09A RETIRED HEADMASTER,CRADLEY
page.content: This is an account of a day in his life.He belongs to a{PROBUS}Club.This means Professional and Businessmen's club.There are altogether forty members in this club.Before going to this club he went to the library.He said that reading was important in his retirement.At the club a fireman came to tell them about safety in homes. Then the fireman gave an extinguisher to a man to have a go with.It was very funny because the man got foam everywhere.He went home for lunch which consisted of a pork pie.He has only simple meals now that he has retired.At about 4p.m.he went to collect his wife from school.At 7.15p.m.he went to a Parish Council meeting.He was back by 9.30p.m.This was the end of a normal day in his life during retirement.
